issue.title: ctype_byname<charT>::do_scan_is & do_scan_not return type should be const charT*

discussion.p: In Section ctype_byname<charT>::do_scan_is() and do_scan_not() are declared to return a const char* not a const charT*.

resolution.p: Change Section do_scan_is() and do_scan_not() to return a const charT*.
